title: What is software asset management? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is SAM - Software Asset Management is a program which help to understand the real and final utilized software applications within the structured business unit. Licensing Gap & License Compliance - Applying SAM, The actual software usage versus the procured SW license practice can be performed to analyze the licensing gap (If any). It helps the organization to adhere with compliant on Software license. SAM Beneficiaries - In fact, some people have a false understanding that Software Asset Management can only relate to IT organization. Originally, Software Asset Management benefits to any company (IT and Non-IT) that receives direct or indirect revenue using the computer software applications. Benefits. - 1) Annual Budgeting , 2) Easily face the Software Licence Compliance Audits, 3) Optimization & Bench-marking, 4) Staying risk free from various internal and external threats
